channel.title: reflections on MHTN Lab
channel.description: Recent content in reflections on MHTN Lab

item.title: You are a network
item.description: Introduction Your entire body is a large system of multiple networks of subsystems that work together to keep you alive.

item.title: On Learning
item.description: Preface Hey, you! Yes, you- I’m doing something new. You’ve stumbled upon my first public journal entry. I’m not sure what prompted me to start writing out my thoughts - I’m not even sure I will continue to write them down.
